ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD image sensor, 650 TV Lines, 3.7mm Pinhole Lens, 4.75" Diameter Case, Smoke Detector Disguised, DC 12V Power Input, 300mA Power Consumption
Signal System: NTSC. Scanning System: 2 to 1 Interlace. Effective Pixels: NTSC 768 (H) X 494 (V), PAL 752(H) x 582(V)
Minimum Illumination: 0.5 LUX/F1.2. S/N Ratio: over 50 dB. Synchronous system: internal.
Video Output: 1 BNC, 1.0 Vp-p, 75 Ohm composite. Operation Temperature: -4°F to 122°F.
Color: white. Dimension: 4.75" x 4.75" x 2.5". Weight: 0.25 lbs. Package contents: covert camera x 1, user's manual x 1, screw x 2.
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech Smoke Detector Hidden Covert CCTV Camera with 1/3" Sony Super HAD Color CCD, 650TVL, 3.7mm Pinhole Lens for Security Surveillance System
